actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $1,000 the personal income tax exemptions of a taxpayer (including the exemption for a spouse, the exemptions for dependents, and the additional exemptions for old age and blindness).

summary.text: Increases the personal exemption for income tax purposes to $1,000 beginning with taxable years after December 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $1,000 the personal income tax exemptions of a taxpayer (including the exemption for a spouse, the exemptions for dependents, and the additional exemptions for old age and blindness).
